transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, aap IndiaMART ke team se baat kar rahe ho aap Impulse ko private limited se?
Customer: Bolye na.
Executive: Sir, Ramesha baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bolye na.
Executive: Sir, actually abhi jo hamara discussion hua tha last time wo aapke discussion hua tha ki jo bhi ek client hai Shubham Sanatani karke Patna ke ek client hai, unhone aapke against me complaint file ki thi, right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To ye wale problem se aapne discussion kar liya client se?
Customer: Client se discuss nahi kar sakta mam, wo zid pe ade hue hai, unhe naya battery chahiye, mai nahi de sakta, maine unka purana battery dispatch karwa diya hai.
Jo battery unka tha maine dispatch karwa diya, kyuki jab tak wo payment nahi karenge BMS fault ka to tab tak mai repair kar nahi saku, kar nahi sakunga. Wo manne ke liye tayar nahi the, isliye maine unka jo tha wo wapis kar diya.
Executive: Hmm, matlab purani battery wahi bhej kar ke fir wo apne usko bhej diya hai aisa.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir, baki sir hamara renewal bhi aa gaya hai, to karwa dijiye sir isko.
Customer: Ek baar mai dekh ke raha hu, baat kar le raha hu Rohit se, halaki is matter me connect wahi karega aapse, theek hai.
Executive: Ha, Rohit sir se discussion karna padega unhe sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir, services se aapko koi problem to nahi aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Hmm, abhi to matlab mai use to nahi kar raha hu to mai kuch nahi keh sakta, mai mai bola na ki is matter me Rohit hi discuss karega.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, aap unse bol do ki sir dekho aapka renewal bhi pending hai to ek baar wo mujhse connect kar le apne side se, mere paas unka contact number hai hi sir. Theek hai, baki aap sir dekho aapke sara jo catalog quality score hai wo kaafi low ho gaya hai, mujhe aapke product ke regarding me discussion karni hai, hame hamare catalog quality score ko bhi improve karna hai. To agar aap free ho to ek video meeting kar sakte hai sir aapke product ke regarding kuch corrections karwane the sir aapke profile me.
Customer: Abhi to mam mai office me hu nahi. Ha, hello.
Executive: Ji, to kitne baje aap office pahuch jaoge?
Customer: Mai aaj office ja hi nahi raha, mai kal jaunga ya parso jaunga.
Executive: Kal ya parso jaoge?
Executive: To matlab free ho ya nahi ho, agar aap free hoge to ghar pe bhi connect kar sakte hai, aisa koi issue nahi hai ki jab aap office jaoge tabhi hum aapko connect karenge.
Customer: To matlab mai jab tak office nahi jaunga mai kaise video call kar saku mai?
Executive: Accha, sir phone se bhi to aap join kar sakte ho, mai aapko aapke WhatsApp pe link share kar dungi.
Customer: Ek ek baar mai na mai aapko call back kar leta hu ya fir message kar deta hu, theek hai mam?
Executive: Theek hai, aap jab bhi free ho jayega ek baar aap mujhe message kar dena, kyuki bahut sare aise corrections hai jo hamare side se bhi pending hai sir, baki hamare catalog quality wagera scores wagera bhi improve karana tha, kaafi low ho gaya isse hamari visibility hamper hoti hai sir IndiaMART ki, hai na?
Executive: To usi ke regarding discussion bhi karna tha. Accha aap mujhe ek cheez batao, aapne bola ki aap IndiaMART use nahi karte ho, right? Aapke side se sir IndiaMART use ho raha hai, to Rohit sir IndiaMART ki services ka use karta hai kya abhi?
Customer: Ji ha, Rohit kar rahe hai aur main hai wo use kar rahe hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir, uske alawa ek cheez bolna jo hamare buyers ke call aa rahe hai, theek hai, aapne yaha pe teen number register kiya hai, ek number ke last me 691 hai, second number ke last me 095 hai aur third number ke last me 235 hai. Ye teen number aapne IndiaMART me register kiya hai, but most buyer ke call hai sir wo hamare continuously base pe miss ho rahe hai. Theek hai, to aapko bhi pata hai sir ki agar koi client hame call karta hai to hame unhe respond karna kitna important hota hai.
Customer: Aisa to nahi ho pa raha, aisa to nahi hona chahiye call miss ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir, sir call miss ho rahe hai, agar aap bhi dekhoge na, pehli baat to ye humne apne number ko na office aur non-office hours dono me add karke rakha hai. To buyer se sir wo hame 24/7 connect karte hai, theek hai. Ab aapko bhi pata hai sir agar hum call receive nahi karenge to yahi call hamare competitors ko chali jayegi. To isliye agar hum discuss nahi karenge, hum baat nahi karenge to ye lead kahi na kahi aur jaake convert ho jayegi. Isliye sir hame kaam karna hai. Agar aap non-working hours matlab raat me 9 baje ke baad free nahi rehte ho to aap waha se aapka number off kar do sir. Theek hai, kyuki koi bhi buyer aapko 9 baje ki raat ke baad fir aapko call nahi karega sir, morning ke 7 am ke baad.
Executive: Sir, 7 am ke pehle. Sir, 7 baje se subah ke 7 baje se raat ke 9 baje tak hi aapko calls aayengi.
Customer: Theek hai, mai baat discuss karta hu aur unko kehta hu connect kare aapse, theek hai.
Executive: Ha ji sir, last month me sir humne 19 19 calls miss ki thi, uske pehle sir humne 35 calls miss ki thi. Uske pehle six calls miss ki thi aur is month me sir total humne five calls miss kiye hai. Total 25 calls hame aayi hai sir jisme se humne five calls miss kar diye.
Customer: Theek hai, mai dekhta hu.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur sir client se agar aap discussion karte ho na to unse reviews bhi maanga karo, last Hello.
Customer: Mai yahi keh raha hu ki ye cheez sara ka sara mai mujhe reviews ke liye to mai bolta hi tha, but abhi jo use kar rahe hai maine bola na mam is is cheez ke baare me Rohit ko concern me dale.
Executive: Ha, sir dekho Rohit sir jo aakhiri me mai ye number tha.
Customer: Hello, ha bolye na. Ha ji.
Customer: 4095 last me number hoga, ye Rohit ka hai, ek baar unke concern me is cheez ko de dijiye, kyuki IndiaMART wahi discuss kar sakenge.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir, dekho aapke bhi knowledge me rahega to theek rahega na sir, to aisa nahi mere mobile me to rehna hi chahiye aap mai aapse discuss kar hi leta hu even jo bhi agar is type ka nahi wagera aata hai to mai usko dekhta hi hu.
Executive: Jarur sir. Theek hai. Mai sir ko bhi ek baar call karke unse discussion kar leti hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, thank you so much, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's catalog quality score is low.

- Buyers' calls are being missed.

- Client filed a complaint regarding battery issue.

- Renewal is pending.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to improve catalog quality score.

- Executive shared the importance of attending calls.

- Executive suggested turning off number during non-working hours.

- Executive will connect with Rohit regarding the issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call Rohit to discuss the issues.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog quality, missed calls, renewal, complaint
